text: Nim'ma (vicchēdita) mahiḷeyara paiki r̥tu srāvada kuritu nirāśarāgiruvavara (r̥tusrāva nintavara) avadhiya viṣayadalli nimage sanśayaviddare, avara avadhi mūru tiṅgaḷāgide. Innū r̥tusrāva ārambhavāgilladavarigū idu anvayisuttade. Garbhiṇiyara avadhiyu prasavadavaregiruttade. Allāhanu, tannannu an̄juvavanige avana vyavahāragaḷannu sulabhagoḷisi koḍuttāne
